text: Rolf Brem (12 February 1926 - 11 April 2014) was a Swiss graphic artist. He was best known as a draftsman, sculptor and illustrator. Many of his sculptures are on display all over Switzerland in public and art galleries. He was born in Lucerne. Brem died on 11 April 2014 in Meggen, Canton of Lucerne, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Illustrators Category:Swiss sculptors Category:People from Lucerne Category:20th-century artists Category:21st- century artists
title: Rolf Brem
